abstract: International Assn of Athletics Federations petitions Court of arbitration for Sport to double two-year doping ban imposed on Boston and Chicago Marathon winner Rita Jeptoo.
lead_paragraph: The International Association of Athletics Federations asked sport’s highest court to double a two-year ban for doping imposed on Jeptoo, a Boston and Chicago Marathon winner.

headline.main: Longer Ban Sought for Rita Jeptoo

snippet: The International Association of Athletics Federations asked sport’s highest court to double a two-year ban for doping imposed on Jeptoo, a Boston and Chicago Marathon winner.
